briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety of Aliskiren 75 mg, 150 mg, and 300 mg in Elderly Patients With Essential Hypertension When Given With a Light Meal in a 8 Week Placebo-controlled Study
officialTitle: An Eight-week Double-blind, Multi-center, Randomized, Placebo-controlled, Parallel-group Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Aliskiren 75 mg, 150 mg, and 300 mg in Elderly Patients With Essential Hypertension When Given With a Light Meal
summary: This study will evaluate the efficacy and safety of aliskiren 75 mg, 150 mg, and 300 mg in elderly patients with essential hypertension when given with a light meal.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change in Mean Sitting Systolic Blood Pressure (msSBP)From Baseline to End of Study (Week 8)
